about_the_game:
Snowdrift Village is Cross of Auria's first free content DLC with challenges in the level 50 range.

This content pack includes:

• Access to Snowdrift Village from a rift in the Veil. Comes complete with NPCs, a questline, exclusive enemies in random battles, and new gear sets on the loot table of the area.

Minimum in-game requirements:

• Ruby must be able to access the Veil at will from anywhere in the world.

Updates:

• Development of this package is ongoing. Be sure to read new community updates to see anything has changed!

• This location receives updates in locked raid wing style up until the final boss is released.
